price: 2. Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi,
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
